TopicTitle: Extra orbital information on mouse hover

Articles.Content:
I would like to see extra orbital information when hovering the mouse over a part of the orbit (including the dashed orbit lines after maneuver nodes: When will the craft be at this position and where are the other celestial bodies in this moment; perhaps even the other spacecraft. At least the position of the target (if set) should be shown at the time the craft is there.

I can imagine, it would be much easier to plan maneuvers then.
Yes more info all around, not just for this.

Yes to that. More info is great. But if it's numbers or text pls disable it in target mode. It already is pretty messy when you get an intersect close to apo- or periapsis. The numbers overlap and I don't get clear readings additional info should go hand in hand with a gui that can support it. Some kind of collision detection for texts would be nice aswell
